subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Drucker gave Wilt Chamberlain a technical foul that caused his ejection from a game in 1962, accounting for the only minutes the star center missed that season.
snippet: Drucker gave Wilt Chamberlain a technical foul that caused his ejection from a game in 1962, accounting for the only minutes the star center missed that season.
